Reviews.Title: Camera kit meets most needs
Reviews.Author: Don H.
Reviews.Content: A great setup. Camera exceded expectations and rest of kit meets most of my needs. A good setup for any camera buff.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Cyril Scott
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this  camera. I researched online and at a few stores. Looked for the best price and ended up here.

Reviews.Title: so so
Reviews.Author: Ricky Top
Reviews.Content: all accesories is bad quality (china bad quality), only is good the camara and lent, but, the price is good,

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) + <2> Nikon 55-300mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Battery Grip for D3100 & D3200 +
<4> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <5> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <6> Spare EN-EL14 Battery + <7> Battery Charger +
<8> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <9> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <10> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <11> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<12> HB-45 Lens Hood + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) with 55-300mm VR Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Battery + Grip + HDMI Cable + Filters + Remote Kit
